QuestData.Title: Shades of Blue
QuestData.Description:
You there, $p! It's good to see a friendly face in these parts. Telash and I were just discussing reports we've heard of... newcomers, in the area.
<Emberthal lowers her voice.>
Blue dragons.
Given our... history, with the blues, Telash and I thought it necessary to assess the situation ourselves.
Please, join us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Emberthal and Telash to Camp Antonidas.

Objectives.Objective: Meet Emberthal and Telash outside of Camp Antonidas.
